SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.view.gui.controller

Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.view.gui.controller.BoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class BoardController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class represents the GUI controller that controls all the phases of the game. It manages the choice of the Starting Card, the choice of the Color, the choice of the Goal, and it manages all the turns until the end of the Game

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      This method initializes the BoardController and all its Java FX elements
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known
      resources - resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • setClient

      public void setClient(Client client, boolean gameToBeLoad)
      This method sets the Client in the Controller, and it sets the internal parameters and the cursor's shape based on its position on the screen
      Parameters:
      client - client instance
      gameToBeLoad - flag that indicates if the player is connecting to a new game or to a loaded game

    • start

      public void start()
      This method starts the BoardController, and it sets the Global Goals on the screen

    • seeMessages

      public void seeMessages()
      This method continuously checks for new message sent by the players

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method sends a ChatMessage. It takes all the information from the Java FX text field and from the Java FX choice box
      Parameters:
      e - ActionEvent that triggers the method

    • chooseColorButtonAction

      public void chooseColorButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is called once the button is clicked. It verifies that all the fields are correctly filled, and it sends to the server the chosen color. It sets the token associated to the chosen color
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent triggered when the client clicks the button

    • personalGoal1ButtonAction

      This method is called once the button is clicked. It stores the Goal Card chosen by the Player
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent triggered when the client clicks the button

      event - ActionEvent triggered when the client clicks the button
